body.name: Minimalist 2% Salicylic Acid Serum For Acne, Blackheads & Open Pores | Reduces Excess Oil & Bumpy Texture | BHA Liquid Exfoliant for Acne Prone & Oily Skin | For Women & Men | 1 fl oz/30ml
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 10 hrs 38 mins
features: [ BLACKHEADS REMOVAL SERUM ]: Our salicylic acid easily penetrates the pore lining and scoops out the dirt, debris, and sebum (clinically proven to work better than oil-based traditional salicylic acid), so skin looks clear and soft. Removes blackheads & whiteheads by keeping your pores clean and controlling excessive oil. It is a potent exfoliant for oily acne prone skin.

[ PORE CLEANSING & TIGHTENING ]: 2% BHA helps in pore cleansing by flushing out oil and dirt, minimizing pore size. Regular use not only reduce blackheads and whiteheads but also prevents future blackheads, resulting in clear skin. You can include it in your night skin care routine for pore exfoliation.

[ ANTI ACNE & BALANCES OIL ]: Removes excess oil and shine resulting in a matt look. Aloe added reduces the acne redness and soothes skin along with providing hydration. By effectively controlling oil production it acts as a potent anti acne (or pimple) serum.

[ CLEAN & TRANSPARENT BEAUTY ]: This serum is (i) Fragrance-free (ii) Silicones-free (iii) Sulfates-free (iv) Parabens-free (v) Essential Oils-free and (vi) Dyes-free. Also, it is non-comedogenic, oil-free, and hypoallergenic. Formulated at pH 3.5 - 4.0 with RonaCare Salicylic Acid Extra Pure from Merck, Germany, a global natural chemistry company.
[ FOR ACNE PRONE & OILY SKIN ]: Unlike physical face scrubs BHA exfoliant are best for all skin types specially acne or sensitive skin. They are best as regular exfoliator for oily acne prone skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Minimalist 2% Salicylic Acid Serum Minimalist 10% Niacinamide Face Serum Minimalist 5% Niacinamide Face Serum Product Benefits Removes Blackheads, Whiteheads, Acne, Bumpy Texture, Cleanses Pores, Reduces Open Pores Reduces Excess Oil/Sebum, Blemishes, Acne Marks, Dark Spots, Promotes Even Tone & Smooth Texture Reduces Dark Spots, Blemishes / Acne Marks, Repairs & Protects against Sun Damaged Skin, Hydrate Skin, Oil/Sebum Control, Promotes Even Tone Suitable Skin Type All but Highly Recommended for Oily, Combination Skin All but Highly Recommended for Oily, Combination Skin All but Highly Recommended for Dry, Damaged, Normal Skin & those who find Niacinamide 10% too strong Item Form Serum Serum Serum Anti-Acne ✓ ✓ ✓ Active Ingredients Salicylic Acid Niacinamide, Matmarine, Zinc Niacinamide, Bifida Ferment Lysate, Hyaluronic Acid Size 1 Fl Oz / 30 ml 1 Fl Oz / 30 ml 1 Fl Oz / 30 ml

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well at the moment
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, I haven’t used this for even a week but it is one of the few products that did not give me a breakout and it seems very gentle on my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clears pores up
reviews.reviewText: This keeps my skin clear and pores clean. This formula actually moisturizes as it goes on, not oily though. On my second bottle, pretty much tightens pores on first use but keep going for best results. I use every other night, alternating with tretinoin or replace tretinoin with this around my period when hormone zits pop up. I'm 45 with combo skin that I have to keep in check

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't dry out your skin
reviews.reviewText: Is not for frequent use, it might irritate your skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, great price
reviews.reviewText: The salicylic acid serum works great for me. The price is really good for such an effective product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Light weight on my skin and feels amazing. As for the people who give it low reviews because they said it arrived “expired”. MFG is the manufacturer date not the expiration date. People need to read!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff
reviews.reviewText: Obsessed. I have an oily t-zone and this has stopped that. I use it at night and helps my makeup stay better the next day helping with oil control. I pair it with a light retinol serum so it’s really drying, then moisturizer and serums and it’s amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m not so sure about this product. I’m amazed by how my skin quickly absorbed it, but it’s oil. My face is oily enough and I’m not sure how oil is supposed to keep the oil on my face down. An hour later, my nose started itching due to the excessive oil on it, and that part of my face produces the most oil. I had to return it quickly. I’m giving it 3 stars, though. It might work for you, but definitely not if you have an oily skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Esto es de uso en cabina, no es recomendable para uso en casa, es un ácido fuerte y lo utilizo para abrir el poro. si no conoce cómo utilizar no usarlo es la mejor opción. Para extracción de comedones la piel .
The media could not be loaded. I am buying this for the second time now. It is very useful for me. It is good for acne sufferers.love you minimalist 🤎

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Minimalist products are very nice abd helpful
I've been using this from one month now 70% of acne are gone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Well packaged, no scent which is good, feels good on the skin

reviews.reviewTitle: Let me tell you how effective this product is.
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- Works really fast (results are visible in just two days)- Light on the skin- Non-sticky- No fragrance- No colour- Best for oily skin- Does not sting or irritate the skinLimiters (not really cons):- This product only prevents acne on the skin but doesn't cure it from the root. You need to combine it with Niacinamide which helps control sebum production and hydrates your skin that may have become dry due to the salicylic acid.- I would advise not to use this product as a solution to removing the oil from the skin (even if without acne), as it may dehydrate it completely and result in inflammation and redness. Use a face wash instead.- For whiteheads, the Niacinamide serum works better than this one. (Check out my review on Minimalist Niacinamide serum for more guidance)
